name: KDF vs. ASSASSINS 1
description: KDF vs. ASSASSINS 1 FPS PC game is a video game inspired by malicious acts of terrorists happening in East Africa region. KDF(Kenya Defence Forces) are the armed forces of the Republic of Kenya made up of Kenya Army, Kenya Navy, and Kenya Air Force. You as a player/ member of KDF solder your mission will be to destroy all enemy forces(Al-Shabaab/Militant group) before reaching your extraction point. The entire country (Kenya) rely on you and they expect peace back before you finish your mission.
